techmeme.title: Analysis: about half of all job seekers are using AI chatbots like ChatGPT and Gemini to assist them in writing CVs, cover letters, and completing assessments (Financial Times)
A look at US chipmaker ON Semiconductor's $2B manufacturing hub in Roznov, Czech Republic to make chips for EVs and more; the hub will create 800 new jobs (Bloomberg)
A look at Fragmentarium, a project to use AI to piece together digitized tablet fragments of the Epic of Gilgamesh, a 3,000-year-old Mesopotamian poem (Erik Ofgang/New York Times)
Inside Worldcoin's Orb factory in Germany and a profile of Tools for Humanity CEO Alex Blania; 6M+ people now have a World ID, and WLD's market cap is $550M+ (Ashlee Vance/Bloomberg)
A recap of Elon Musk's Donald Trump interview on X, which started 42 mins late; X says it was at times heard by 1M+ people, while Musk had prepared for 8M (Financial Times)
